Completed Government Training and I am certified by U.S. Immigration and Customs (ICE) on 
Forensic Tool Kit (FTK)
FTK 
Netclean 
Encase
Celebrite UFED 4 PC,  PHYSICAL ANALYZER
BLACKBAG, BLACKLIGHT 
AXIOM
Magnet Internet Evidence Finder. (IEF)
I have been using the above tools to directly assist in criminal investigations for Homeland Security Investigation (HSI), Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). My digital investigations are used to write detailed reports of my findings, my finding are critical for the investigator work to build a case against the accused. I hold a Top Secret Clearance, and I have given sworn testimony in federal cases with which i have provided forensic findings.
defaultPosition.title: Computer Forensic Analyst (HERO)(Human Exploitation Rescue Operative)

positions.title: Buisness Owner

positions.description:
As the Senior 88M/88Z  provides professional support and technical guidance to customers requiring motor transport,  plans manages , and monitors unit motor transport operations as the Truck master;  establishes and organizes the unit motor park; prepares and implements the truck company convoy operations security and defense plan; receives and distributes highway motor transport missions; supervise and directs unit dispatching of vehicles; serves as the transportation subject manner expert at staff level positions , such as the Support Operations Section. This Senior Sergeant plans, directs, and controls movement operations and service support for freight, personnel, and cargo by all transportation modes. Assists in the coordination and implementation of operations, administration, training programs. Consolidates, prepares, reviews, and processes regular and special operating equipment and maintenance activities. Consolidates, prepares, reviews, and processes regular and special reports of command transportation activities. Multimodal expert charged with knowing the transportation capabilities, and requirements. Monitors activity at the intra-theater strategic deployment level to direct and sustain in-transit visibility of shipments. 
Essentially I worked with the Battalion transportation to plan and organize shipments from pick up to drop off of goods and equipment. As an additional duty I also managed the supply section and supervised regular inventory of supply stock and maintenance shelf stock and parts, to assure the company had the proper amount on hand at all times and was re-ordered when necessary.  I supervise a section of 38 personnel and I have oversight on the maintenance section of 22 personnel. Overall my mission of production control and motor transport is to support the war fighter, and the customer to move goods and equipment safely over treacherous roadways in Afghanistan.
positions.title: US Army, Retired Sergeant Major
